## Discussion
### Potential Explanations
- Employment and demography composition effects. 
- Informality. 
- Non-monetary value. 

### Relevance for (macro) economics 
- Expenditure-only measures may overstate consumption inequality. 
- HHs that engage in autoconsumption able to hedge from idiosyncratic food price shocks. 
- HHs facing labour market hardship substitute towards home production.
